basicInfo.name: Yumi
basicInfo.flavor: Though the civil war on Moonlit Isle ended, Yumi's village was burned to ashes by a black knight wielding a scythe and a gray mage. Yumi vowed to avenge her people.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Focus Shot
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Arrow Shower
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 52% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Unable to Recover. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Pain Block
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

profile.story: Ace's well-trained army vastly outmatched the ragtag forces of Waki's rebellion.\nIn desperation, Waki used sorcery to transform his soldiers into ruthless killing machines, devoid of fear or hesitation.\nWith the Curse of Destruction spreading through their ranks, their brutality became unstoppable.

basicInfo.name: Yumi
basicInfo.flavor: Under the grip of Waki's evil sorcery, the young village girl, Yumi, was turned into a heartless killing puppet.

profile.story: Ace's well-trained army vastly outmatched the ragtag forces of Waki's rebellion.\nIn desperation, Waki used sorcery to transform his soldiers into ruthless killing machines, devoid of fear or hesitation.\nWith the Curse of Destruction spreading through their ranks, their brutality became unstoppable.

basicInfo.name: Yumi
basicInfo.flavor: Waki inflated taxes tenfold, embezzled money, and blamed it all on lord Ace, inciting the commoners against him. Among them was Yumi, who joined Waki's cause to bring Ace down.
